name: Heng Huang
content: Heng Huang - Main blank blank Heng Huang Brendan Iribe Endowed Professor Department of Computer Science Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering m mMAIN mPUBLICATION mTEACHING m Brief Biography: Heng Huang received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Dartmouth College, and his M.S. and B.S. from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. He is a Brendan Iribe Endowed Professor in Computer Science at the University of Maryland College Park. Contact Information: Office: Brendan Iribe Center for Computer Science and Engineering, IRB 3238 8125 Paint Branch Drive, College Park, MD 20742. Email: heng@umd.edu Research Interests: Machine Learning, Data Mining, Big Data Computing, NLP Bioinformatics, Neuroinformatics, Precision Medicine, Health Informatics Computer Vision, Medical Image Analysis Please note that all my research works are publicly available. Information for Future Students: I am looking for Postdoc, PhD students, highly motivated for doing research in the areas of machine learning, large-scale optimization, NLP, computer vision, bioinformatics, and biomedical image analysis. If you are interested, please contact me. Recent Conferences related to my research: NeurIPS, abstract due May 11, full paper due May 15 EMNLP, full paper due May 19 ICLR, abstract due Sep 19, full paper due Sep 24 CVPR, abstract due Nov 06, full paper due Nov 13 RECOMB, abstract due Nov 07, full paper due Nov 14 ACL, full paper due Jan 5 ISMB, full paper due Jan 20 ICML, abstract due Jan 23, full paper due Jan 28 How to evaluate papers in top computer science conferences? For reference purpose, there are some reasonable public CS conference ranking lists: Ref1, Ref2. For CS program ranking: CS open rankings.
